mapper.insert: insert into cart (CartId, UserId, ProId, Num, Total, CartCreateTime, CartUpdateTime, CartMark) values (#{cartid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{proid,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cartcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cartupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{cartmark,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update cart set UserId = #{userid,jdbcType=CHAR}, ProId = #{proid,jdbcType=CHAR}, Num = #{num,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Total = #{total,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, CartCreateTime = #{cartcreatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CartUpdateTime = #{cartupdatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CartMark = #{cartmark,jdbcType=INTEGER} where CartId = #{cartid,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: select CartId, UserId, ProId, Num, Total, CartCreateTime, CartUpdateTime, CartMark from cart
